name: Mini Rogue
description:
Welcome to the dungeons of doom.

Mini Rogue a game made in 3days for the Mini Jam 116.

Theme: Pocket sized

limitation: All Movement is Tile Based

Use the arrow keys to move.

Please leave a comment if you enjoyed the game :D You can also follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/duckouille

music: https://opengameart.org/content/underground-storm-chiptune8-bit-influence
